name: Potato Salad
instructions: Boil potato pieces (about 3-5 potato for 6) about 4-5 minutes just so it’s done but not soft.
Mix together eggs, potato, celery, onion, and radish.
I put the potato, eggs, celery, radish and onion together early in the day and when it is totally cool I add the dressing, and let chill for several hours to flavor.
I mix about 1-2 cups mayo, a few tablespoons milk, a few tablespoons mustard and seasonings.
Grandma B’s is a soft yellow color, Grandma H’s has more mustard in it and so is a darker color.
